meanings.definition: The act of listing or detailing individual items.
meanings.sent1: The itemizations of all the products in the store were neatly organized.
meanings.sent2: She carefully reviewed the itemizations of her expenses before submitting the report.
meanings.sent3: The itemizations of the groceries made her realize she had bought too many snacks.
meanings.sent4: His itemizations of the tasks ahead painted a clear picture of the workload.
meanings.sent5: The itemizations of the ingredients in the recipe were essential for cooking success.

meanings.definition: A detailed list or statement of individual items.
meanings.sent1: The accountant prepared detailed itemizations of the company's expenses.
meanings.sent2: The itemizations on the receipt helped her track her purchases.
meanings.sent3: The itemizations of his toy collection amused his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her itemizations of the library books were as thorough as a detective's notes.
meanings.sent5: The itemizations of the auction items were crucial for the event's success.
